con:request.name: Sale 05 - Special Characters (@)
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:ProcessCreditCard>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CardLastFourDigits>${=context.expand( '${CorpCardMagneticData}' ).split( "=" )[0].trim().reverse().take(4).reverse()}</acr1:CardLastFourDigits>\r <acr1:CardNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CardVerificationNumber>${CorpCardCVV}</acr1:CardVerificationNumber>\r <acr1:CardholderVerificationMethod xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CurrencyCode>${CurrencyCode}</acr1:CurrencyCode>\r <acr1:CustomerBillingAddress xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CustomerCity xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CustomerCode>${CustomerCode}</acr1:CustomerCode>\r <acr1:CustomerEmailAddress>${CustomerEmail}</acr1:CustomerEmailAddress>\r <acr1:CustomerPhone xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CustomerState xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CustomerZipCode xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:InvoiceDetail><![CDATA[TransactionType:Sale<LevelIIIData> <Header> <CustomerCode>987654321</CustomerCode> <ShiptofromZIPcode>33183</ShiptofromZIPcode> <Destinationcountrycode>840</Destinationcountrycode> <VATinvoicereferencenumber>1</VATinvoicereferencenumber> <VATtaxamountrate>0.21</VATtaxamountrate> <Freightshippingamount>0</Freightshippingamount> <Dutyamount>0</Dutyamount> <Orderdate>130304</Orderdate> <Discountamount>0</Discountamount> </Header> <Products> <product> <ItemCommodityCode>@</ItemCommodityCode> <ItemDescription>@</ItemDescription> <ItemSequenceNumber>1</ItemSequenceNumber> <LineItemTotal>0.93</LineItemTotal> <ProductCode>030</ProductCode> <Quantity>1</Quantity> <Selected>true</Selected> <UnitCost>1</UnitCost> <UnitofMeasureCode>CCT</UnitofMeasureCode> </product> <product> <ItemCommodityCode>@</ItemCommodityCode> <ItemDescription>@</ItemDescription> <ItemSequenceNumber>2</ItemSequenceNumber> <LineItemTotal>0.93</LineItemTotal> <ProductCode>031</ProductCode> <Quantity>1</Quantity> <Selected>true</Selected> <UnitCost>1</UnitCost> <UnitofMeasureCode>CCT</UnitofMeasureCode> </product> <product> <ItemCommodityCode>@</ItemCommodityCode> <ItemDescription>@</ItemDescription> <ItemSequenceNumber>3</ItemSequenceNumber> <LineItemTotal>0.93</LineItemTotal> <ProductCode>032</ProductCode> <Quantity>1</Quantity> <Selected>true</Selected> <UnitCost>1</UnitCost> <UnitofMeasureCode>CCT</UnitofMeasureCode> </product> </Products> <Notes> <Note/> </Notes> </LevelIIIData>]]></acr1:InvoiceDetail>\r <acr1:InvoiceNumber>${InvoiceNumber}</acr1:InvoiceNumber>\r <acr1:KeySerialNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:MagneticData>${CorpCardMagneticData}</acr1:MagneticData>\r <acr1:NameOnCard>${CorpCardNameOnCard}</acr1:NameOnCard>\r <acr1:Pin xsi:nil="true"/>\r
